"If you want to be happy, focus on being compassionate."

The quote "If you want to be happy, focus on being compassionate" is often attributed to the Dalai Lama. However, it is important to note that the exact phrasing may not be found in his published works, but it closely aligns with his teachings on happiness and compassion. The Dalai Lama frequently emphasizes the importance of compassion in achieving personal happiness and well-being.
